name: gnome-show-app-icons-extension
description: GNOME extension to display open applications as icons in the top panel

scripts.install: npm run build && cp -r . ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/show-app-icons@bigimattia && gnome-extensions enable show-app-icons@bigimattia
scripts.uninstall: gnome-extensions disable show-app-icons@bigimattia && rm -rf ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/show-app-icons@bigimattia && echo 'Extension uninstalled.'
